exceptions.exn: In environment u, v, a, b : nat H : u <> 0 H0 : v <> 0 H1 : is_gcd u v 1 H2 : forall u v : nat, nat -> nat -> u <> 0 -> v <> 0 -> is_gcd u v 1 -> nat Unable to unify "nat" with "exists w : nat, rem w u = rem a u /\\ rem w v = rem b v /\\ 2 < w".

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. apply CRT_bin_informative; auto.
